metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29457 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: Reflected XSS attacks, occur when a malicious script is reflected off a web application to the victim's browser. The script can be activated through Action form fields, which can be sent as request to a website with a vulnerability that enables execution of malicious scripts.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
